description: This file contains the implementation of the NotesRepository class, which interacts with the database using Entity Framework Core to manage note entities within the application.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: An Entity Framework Core implementation of the INotesRepository interface, providing CRUD operations for Note entities.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously adds a new note to the database and returns the created note.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a note by its ID, including associated user data.

methods.name: GetByUserAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of notes for a specific user, supporting pagination and ordering.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously updates an existing note in the database.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously deletes a note identified by its ID from the database.
